== Calculator ==

Calculator is installed by default in Ubuntu. With it you can perform all sorts of mathematical, scientific and financial calculations..

Menu: Accessories > Calculator

== Key Features ==

* Offers different levels of complexity

== Hints and Tips ==

=== Complex calculations ===

Use the 'View' menu to select different calculators:
 - Basic<<BR>>
 - Scientific<<BR>>
 - Advanced<<BR>>
 - Financial<<BR>>
